description:
Ayaka`s Meowstic battled against Ash`s Froakie outside the castle in Avugnon Town near the Diamond Country. It was the second matchup in a 3 on 3 battle. Ayaka`s Meowstic won the battle and defeated Ash`s Froakie.
None of its moves can be confirmed due to the lack of dialog during this scene.
name: Nyaonix (Ayaka)
